item.title: [317/PI] Items Kept On Death
item.dc:creator: @Snackman Snackman
item.description:
@Snackman wrote:

Yes I have searched through several sites and google. I didn’t find the answer in there, only “I need this too!” messages…

Ok, so I have been working on Items Kept On Death lately. Everything needed is there, the only thing is this:

Interface 17100, the real Items kept on death interface:

Interface 6960, which I found in some tutorial:

Now, the only difference in the code is this:
c.getPA().showInterface(6960);

case 108003: if(!c.isSkulled && c.prayerActive[10]) { c.getItems().resetKeepItems(); c.getItems().keepItem(0, false); c.getItems().keepItem(1, false); c.getItems().keepItem(2, false); c.getItems().keepItem(3, false); c.sendMessage("Your Protect Item Prayer is ON. Therefor, you keep four items instead of three."); } else if(!c.isSkulled && !c.prayerActive[10]) { c.getItems().resetKeepItems(); c.getItems().keepItem(0, false); c.getItems().keepItem(1, false); c.getItems().keepItem(2, false); c.sendMessage("With Protect Item Prayer you get to keep four items if you die."); } else if(c.isSkulled && !c.prayerActive[10]) { c.sendMessage("You are skulled. Without protect item prayer, you cannot keep items when you die!"); } else { c.getItems().resetKeepItems(); c.getItems().keepItem(0, false); c.sendMessage("You are skulled and will only keep an item if you use the protect item prayer."); } c.getItems().sendItemsKept(); c.getPA().showInterface(6960); c.getItems().resetKeepItems(); break;

When I set the showInterface to 6960 it works. When I set it to 17100, no items are shown…

Please help me with this, I tried client-sided editing too, but couldn’t find much in there either…

Thanks in Advance,
Snackman.

Read full topic
